mapper.select: select* from goods where goodsname like '%' #{ooo} '%' or details like '%' #{ooo} '%' or title like '%' #{ooo} '%'

select g.* ,sum(goodsNum) goodssum from goods g,orderdetail o where g.id=o.goodsid and g.count>0 group by g.id,g.goodsName,g.classfiy,g.details,g.price,g.count,g.title,g.imgpath,g.createTime order by goodssum desc limit 5

select g.* ,count(o.goodsId) goodsidcount from goods g,orderdetail o where g.id=o.goodsId and g.count>0 group by g.id,g.goodsName,g.classfiy,g.details,g.price,g.count,g.title,g.imgpath,g.createTime order by goodsidcount desc limit 5
